pattern.name: api_verification
pattern.description: Standard process for verifying an API endpoint

steps.step: Construct a minimal valid request (curl or script)
Execute request and capture full response
Document any missing fields or type mismatches

pattern.name: mcp_tool_audit
pattern.description: Process for auditing an MCP tool

steps.step: List tools using `list_tools` (if available) or inspect code
Test tool with valid and invalid inputs
Confirm error messages are helpful and accurate

pattern.name: documentation_update
pattern.description: Pattern for updating docs based on findings
pattern.template: ## Discrepancy Found - **Documented Behavior:** [What docs say] - **Observed Behavior:** [What actually happened] - **Impact:** [Why this matters] - **Recommendation:** [Update docs OR Fix code]
